content:
write a blog post announcing a 17,000-square-foot retail expansion anchored by a high-end steakhouse called Chophouse Nocatee with a rooftop bar. 
“We are excited for these unique additions to our vibrant Town Center,” said Michael O’Steen, Managing Director at The PARC Group, Nocatee’s master developer.
The Chophouse at Nocatee is owned and managed by the same team behind Chophouse Thirteen in Mandarin.
“This next phase of retail will tie everything together to create the walkable Town Center we’ve been working hard to achieve over the past several years,” said Riley Skinner, Vice President of Skinner Brothers Realty.
